Summary: Small jolting object with bright light and mis-shapen/shape-shifting body.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving east getting ready to get on the expressway and saw a bright object roughly one mile out and one half mile or so off the ground. It was too close to be a plane; it was not a bird. It kept bouncing from left to right and down then up and diagonal. It seemed to be changing shape as it would change speed from quick to slow. At one point it looked to be long and going vertical, then a bright light came from it, like it lite up but white-not like from the sun, but an illuminous light that came from the object itself. It was small and at times kept fading somewhat but not completely. The duration of the event was approximately 2 to 3 minutes. I almost wrecked the whole time.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Flushing
